name: TC_04_06 | Verify user can edit DNS record in hosted zone
description: Verify user can edit DNS record in hosted zone.
descriptionHtml: Verify user can edit DNS record in hosted zone.

testStage.description: Verify user can edit DNS record in hosted zone.

steps.name: Preconditions: Login as a registered user
Preconditions: Create hosted zones via API.
Click edit Dns Record on type "NS"
